content.text: Hi! I'm a personal shopper and I paddle board on my days off. How about you?
Hi! I am proud of my sister for being a great guitarist. I also like going to museums on the weekend!
I love going to museums too! I like learning new things. What museums have you been to lately?
I went to the Natural History Museum last weekend. I learned a lot about dinosaurs!
That sounds awesome! I love dinosaurs too! I went to the Louvre in Paris last year. It was incredible!
Wow! I've always wanted to go to the Louvre. I'm sure it was amazing!
It was! I saw the Mona Lisa and Venus de Milo. It was so cool to see real works of art up close.
You should definitely go one day! It's a once in a lifetime experience!
I definitely will! Thanks for the recommendation!
You're welcome! I'm glad you liked it!
